Survival Analysis: Intuition & Implementation in Python

A statistical technique used to answer business questions such as customer churn time, machine lifespan, and marketing channel retention rates. It helps predict the likelihood of a patient surviving after diagnosis.

Key Concepts:

  • Kaplan-Meier Estimate
  • Cox Proportional Hazard Model
  • retention rate
  • survival probability
  • Event Time Estimation
  • Probability of Survival
  • Bias in Estimates
survival analysis time to event business intelligence statistical modeling Survival Analysis Kaplan Meier Estimate KM Curve Censored Data
